text: Gumazamizir kaba Akɨnafarir kamɨn aven itir akam baregha, men naviba bɨghizɨ me aziava arai. Ezɨ gavmanɨn faragha zuir gumazim Nehemia ko, ofa gamir gumazim Esra ko, Livain anabamɨn gumazir men sure gamiba, me gumazamizibav gɨa ghaze, “Kar Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, a baghavɨra itir dughiar ekiam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia naviba osemegh arangan markɨ.”
